summary.span: 提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the information about the current user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象公开的属性和方法 `My.User` 提供对有关当前用户的信息的访问。The properties and methods exposed by the `My.User` object provide access to the information about the current user. "当前用户" 的含义在 Windows 和 Web 应用程序之间略有不同。The meaning of "current user" differs slightly between Windows and Web applications. 在 Windows 应用程序中，当前用户是运行应用程序的用户。In a Windows application, the current user is the user who runs the application. 在 Web 应用程序中，当前用户是访问应用程序的用户。In a Web application, the current user is the user who accesses the application. `My.User`属性还为当前用户提供对的访问 。The `My.User` property also provides access to the for the current user. 主体对象表示用户的安全上下文，包括该用户的标识和用户所属的任何角色。A principal object represents the user's security context, including that user's identity and any roles to which the user belongs. 对于 Windows 应用程序，此属性提供的功能与 属性相同。For Windows applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property. 对于 Web 应用程序，此属性提供的功能与 属性返回的对象的属性相同 。For Web applications, this property provides the same functionality as the property of the object returned by the property. > [!NOTE] > 对于 Windows 应用程序，默认情况下，只有 **Windows 应用程序** 模板上生成的项目会初始化该 `My.User` 对象。For Windows applications, only projects built on the **Windows Application** template initialize the `My.User` object by default. 在所有其他 Windows 项目类型中，你必须 `My.User` 通过 显式调用方法或将值分配给来初始化对象 。In all other Windows project types, you must initialize the `My.User` object by calling the method explicitly or by assigning a value to . > [!NOTE] > `My.User`当在 windows 95 和 windows 98 下运行时，对象无法报告有关当前 Windows 用户的信息，因为这些操作系统不支持登录用户的概念。The `My.User` object cannot report information about the current Windows user when run under Windows 95 and Windows 98 because those operating systems do not support the concept of a logged-on user. 您必须实现自定义身份验证，才能 `My.User` 在这些操作系统上使用该对象。You must implement custom authentication to use the `My.User` object on those operating systems. ## Examples 此示例检查应用程序是否正在使用 Windows 或自定义身份验证，并使用这些信息来分析 `My.User.Name` 属性。This example checks if the application is using Windows or custom authentication, and uses that information to parse the `My.User.Name` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyUser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 对象中，此属性对属性的属性进行包装 。In the object, this property wraps the property of the property. 有关更多详细信息，请参见 属性。For more detailed information, see the property.
